channel.title: Batman Arkham Asylum
channel.description: I'm just wondering, what do you all think about this game? I personally think it looks like shit, but I haven't played the game yet so I guess I really can't pass judgement.

item.title: Batman Arkham Asylum
item.dc:creator: Nintyuk
item.description:
Its a 8 gb uncompressed download on a 1 m/b connection :[ ,
Im enjoying the game so far, but it’s got a few game breaking bugs that have me stuck.
On some vents the grappling hook refuses to lock onto and pull you in causing me to be either a) unable to continue with the story or b) stuck in a small room until I load the last checkpoint up.

Also on several occasions instead of attaching on to any thing in the room the grapple drags you out of the map in to the void on to a small platform outside the map which if you fall off you will fall endlessly meaning the only escape is reloading the last checkpoint.

Read full topic

item.title: Batman Arkham Asylum
item.dc:creator: Nintyuk
item.description:
Well i just finished building my new computer and my graphics card came with a free copy of Batman to download.
I’ll tell you guys how i find it once steam finishes downloading it, at 96% as i type.
Its taken around 12 hours to download it on my internet connection though.

Edit: Finished downloading

Read full topic

item.title: Batman Arkham Asylum
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Played the demo once… then twice… then a third time… and then I wanted to get this game.
If the fact that Yahtzee was somewhat positive about the game doesn’t convince you that this game is awesome, nothing will:
https://www.escapistmagazine.com/videos/view/zero-punctuation/926-Batman-Arkham-Asylum

Read full topic

garthbartin:

… I haven’t played the game yet so I guess I really can’t pass judgement.

Stick to what you tell yourself. If you didn’t add that sentence right there tons of people would have gladly gotten on the “play the game first and then rate u idiot” bandwagon.

major :facepalm:

Wish i could play it but need computer upgrades first.

item.title: Batman Arkham Asylum
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
It’s got Luke Skywalker as Joker and everyone else from the 90’s cartoon, and it’s actually fun to batarang people all the time. Not at all a terrible game.

Download the Demo.
